auth.loginFailed: Login failed, please check your username and password
auth.usernameMinLength: Username must be at least 3 characters!
auth.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters!
auth.passwordMismatch: The two passwords do not match!
auth.sessionExpiredMessage: Your login session has expired. Please login again to continue.
auth.subtitle: Interview Collaboration System

room.coderpadUrlInvalid: Please enter a valid URL (including https://)
room.systemDesignWebVersionHint: Open the shared system design link in an external browser
room.codeLinkExpiredHoverHint: The room’s code link has expired. Please update it.
room.codeLinkExpiredAdminHint: This room’s code link has expired. Please edit the room in the Dashboard and update the link/expiry before continuing.
room.codeLinkExpiredUserHint: This room’s code link has expired. Please ask the creator to update the link before entering.
room.coderpadRoomHint: This room uses a shared code link as the coding interface
room.enterWebVersionHint: Open the shared code link in an external browser
room.openExternalLinkContent: This room uses an external link as the primary interface. Open it in a new tab now?
room.markLinkExpiredConfirmContent: This will set the link expiry to a past time and block entering the room (for testing). Continue?
room.editPermissionDenied: Only the creator or an admin can edit room settings
room.creator: Creator
room.roomDeletedMessage: Room "{{roomName}}" has been deleted by administrator. You will be automatically logged out.
room.roomNotFound: Room not found or has been deleted
room.deleteRoomConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete room "{{roomName}}"? This action cannot be undone.
room.deleteRoomWithUsers:
There are {{count}} users online in the room: {{users}}.

Deleting the room will force these users to exit. Are you sure you want to continue?
room.roomDeleteSuccessWithUsers: Room deleted successfully. Notified {{count}} online users: {{users}}
room.alreadyJoined: You have already joined this room
room.cannotShareEndedRoom: Room has ended, cannot copy room code

editor.roomEndedByAdmin: Room has been ended by administrator
editor.leaveRoomWarning: Are you sure you want to leave the current room? Unsaved changes may be lost.
editor.endRoomWarning: Are you sure you want to end the current room? Other users will not be able to continue using it after the room ends. This action cannot be undone.
editor.copyFailed: Copy failed, please manually copy room code: {{roomCode}}
editor.syncContentHint: Sync latest content from room creator (Global shortcut: Cmd+Shift+" / Ctrl+Shift+")
editor.syncWarningHint: ⚠️ Warning: This will overwrite all your current edits! Sync has delay, do not trigger frequently (Global shortcut: Cmd+Shift+" / Ctrl+Shift+")
editor.syncCooldown: Sync is on cooldown, please wait {{seconds}} seconds before trying again
editor.contentAlreadyLatest: Content is already up to date
editor.confirmSyncContent: This will overwrite your current content with the latest content saved by the room creator. Continue?
editor.syncRequestContent: {{username}} is requesting to sync your code content. If you agree, your current code will be saved to the database.
editor.syncRequestAgreed: Sync request agreed and content saved
editor.formatSyncHint: Tip: If code format is messy, use
editor.showBubbleHint: Bubble displays selected text to give key hints to candidates, prevents missing code in large codebase, max 20 characters
editor.leaveRoomHint: Leave current room and return to room list
editor.endRoomHint: End room, all members will be removed
editor.shareRoomHint: Copy room code to share with others

toolbox.title: Toolbox
toolbox.resetConfirmContent: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to default values? This will reset font size, window opacity and theme settings.
toolbox.resetSuccess: All settings have been reset to default values

dashboard.title: Room Management
dashboard.confirmLeaveRoom: Are you sure you want to leave room "{{roomName}}"?
